name: Abigail
description:
I am sure, that the day will come when I meet my special man, who will give me his heart, who will be honest and faithful, determined and self-confident. I am looking for a reliable, easy-going, gentle, kind, caring and energetic man. He should become my life partner!
I’m an adventurous, cooperative, a happy and positive person. I’m honest, caring, patient and romantic. I live in a simple life and living it to the fullest. I spend quality time with my family as well. I’m very kind and sensitive woman, who believes in wonderful things to happen. I’m a loyal person who’s looking for somebody whom I can enjoy the good things in my life with. : I’m looking for a gentleman who’s understanding, caring, loving and romantic. Someone who knows how to handle and commits a sincere and serious real life relationship. A lifetime partner through good and in bad times, thick and thin and sickness and in health. A man who will make me happy all the time and who will be there to love me and can give his full trust and love to me.
